name: Extract News
description: Pull structured data from online news articles

api_methods.name: Article
api_methods.description: Extract normalized data from any blog/article

utterances.utterance: Can you extract data from the article at https://www.bbc.com/news/world-56844149?
I need the structured data from this blog: https://techcrunch.com/2023/09/15/ai-advancements-in-healthcare/

Get the normalized data from this article: https://www.forbes.com/sites/johnkoetsier/2023/08/20/5g-technology-impact-on-business/

I want the structured data from this news article: https://www.cnn.com/2023/07/10/tech/elon-musk-twitter-changes/index.html.
